ygData.subject: Re: 3 questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve gone in via the front door with a group then past the 2 gargoyles (not up the stairs).  There is a room with a muscian pit where the gypsies spawn. At
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "EQBards" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] 3 questions
>Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 09:55:15 -0600
>
>Hello all,
>
>I have a few questions this morning for everyone.
>
>1) Which room in Mistmoore is the home of the gypsy lute dropping gypsies?
> How do I get there? Is there a secret way (i.e. through the secret room
>in the graveyard) which could be less hazardous to a group of around 30's?
>(I too share Shada's propensity for being lost - hehe. My train hotkey
>shouts "TRAIN TO......UM......Just watch out!") Once I get to said room,
>how difficult a place is it? 3 spawns, 4?

I've gone in via the front door with a group then past the 2 gargoyles (not
up the stairs). There is a room with a muscian pit where the gypsies spawn.
At night they spawn as werewolves. Not sure what the best way to break
the room is though, sorry.


>
>2) Where are Choon and Froon (I've spent the vast majority of my time on
>the East coast, so I'm not too familiar with the Karanas)? About what
>level are they? Is it possible to pull one with out the other?
>

if you are 27+ just use Charm to have them kill each other. They are located
on the western hills in west karana, near the Orge camp.

>And in another non-related vein:
>
>Can anyone please post or supply the web address to a comprehensive list of
>Bard skill caps? And once more, where do you have to go to train that
>first point in Instill Doubt?

To learn Instill Doubt go the the bard guildmaster in Freeport, he is on the
upstairs.

Skill list with caps: http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/BardSkills.htm

>
>Thanks ahead of time for all the help,
>
>Weiland
><Disciples of Truth>
>Erollisi Marr
>
>
>

Rokenn
